line: non-provincial. The vast achievements of science, practical and

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: theoretical, were produced for the world, not for a race. Mr. Asquith

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: speaks with justice and eloquence of the appearance of Darwin's _Origin

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: of Species_ which he distinguishes as being "if not actually the most

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: important, certainly the most interesting event of the Age," and his

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: remarks on the fortune of that book are excellent. No one can

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: over-estimate the value of what we owe to Darwin. But perhaps a

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Frenchman might speak in almost the same terms of Claude Bernard, whose

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: life and work ran parallel with Darwin's. If the _Origin of Species_

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: made an epoch in 1859, the _Introduction à la médicine expérimental_

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: made another in 1865. Both these books, as channels by which the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: experimental labours of each investigator reached the prepared and

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: instructed public, exercised at once, and have continued ever since to

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: exercise, an enormous effect on thought as well as on knowledge. They

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: transformed the methods by which man approaches scientific

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: investigation, and while they instructed they stimulated a new ardour

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: for instruction. In each case the value of the discovery lay in the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: value of the idea which led to the discovery, and, as some one has said

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: in the case of Claude Bernard, they combined for the first time the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: operations of science and philosophy. The parallel between these two

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: contemporaries extends, in a measure, to their disciples and successors,

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: and seems to suggest that Mr. Asquith in his generous and difficult

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: estimate may have exaggerated the purely Victorian element in the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: science of the age of Darwin. This only accentuates the difficulty, and

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: he may perhaps retort that there is an extreme danger in suggesting what

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: does and what does not form a part of so huge a system.

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Justifiably Mr. Asquith takes it for granted that the performance of the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: central years of the Victorian Age was splendid. With those who deny

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: merit to the writers and artists of the last half century it is

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: difficult to reach a common ground for argument. What is to be the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: criterion of taste if all the multiform exhibitions of it which passed

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: muster from 1840 to 1890 are now to be swept away with contumely?

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Perhaps indeed it is only among those extravagant romanticists who are

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: trying to raise entirely new ideals, unrelated to any existing forms of

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: art and literature, that we find a denial of all merit to the Victorian

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: masters. Against this caricature of criticism, this Bolshevism, it would

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: be hopeless to contend. But there is a large and growing class of more

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: moderate thinkers who hold, in the first place, that the merit of the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: leading Victorian writers has been persistently over-estimated, and that

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: since its culmination the Victorian spirit has not ceased to decay,

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: arriving at length at the state of timidity and repetition which

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: encourages what is ugly, narrow, and vulgar, and demands nothing better

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: than a swift dismissal to the dust-bin.

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Every stratum of society, particularly if it is at all sophisticated,

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: contains a body of barbarians who are usually silent from lack of

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: occasion to express themselves, but who are always ready to seize an

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: opportunity to suppress a movement of idealism. We accustom ourselves to

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: the idea that certain broad principles of taste are universally

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: accepted, and our respectable newspapers foster this benevolent delusion

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: by talking habitually "over the heads," as we say, of the majority of

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: their readers. They make "great music for a little clan," and nothing

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: can be more praiseworthy than their effort, but, as a matter of fact,

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: with or without the aid of the newspapers, the people who really care

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: for literature or art, or for strenuous mental exercise of any kind, are

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: relatively few. If we could procure a completely confidential statement

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: of the number of persons to whom the names of Charles Lamb and

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Gainsborough have a distinct meaning, and still more of those who can

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: summon up an impression of the essays of the one and of the pictures of

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: the other, we should in all probability be painfully startled. Yet since

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: these names enjoy what we call a universal celebrity, what must be the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: popular relation to figures much less prominent?

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: The result of this tyranny of fame, for so it must appear to all those

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: who are inconvenienced by the expression of it, is to rouse a sullen

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: tendency to attack the figures of art and literature whenever there

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: arrives a chance of doing that successfully. Popular audiences can

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: always be depended upon to cheer the statement of "a plain man" that he

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: is not "clever" enough to understand Browning or Meredith. An assurance

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: that life is too short to be troubled with Henry James wakes the lower

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: middle class to ecstasy. An opportunity for such protests is provided by

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: our English lack of critical tradition, by our accepted habit of saying,

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: "I do hate" or "I must say I rather like" this or that without reference

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: to any species of authority. This seems to have grown with dangerous

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: rapidity of late years. It was not tolerated among the Victorians, who

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: carried admiration to the highest pitch. They marshalled it, they

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: defined it, they turned it from a virtue into a religion, and called it

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Hero Worship. Even their abuse was a kind of admiration turned inside

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: out, as in Swinburne's diatribes against Carlyle, who himself fought

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: against the theory of Darwin, not philosophically, but as though it were

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: a personal insult to himself. Such violence of taste is now gone out of

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: fashion; every scribbler and dauber likes to believe himself on a level

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: with the best, and the positive criterion of value which sincere

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: admiration gave is lost to us. Hence the success of Mr. Lytton Strachey.

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: But the decline of ardour does not explain the whole position, which we

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: have to face with firmness. Epochs come to an end, and before they have

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: their place finally awarded to them in history they are bound to endure

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: much vicissitude of fortune. No amount of sarcasm or of indignant

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: protest will avail to conceal the fact that we stand to-day at the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: porch, that much more probably we have already penetrated far into the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: vestibule, of a new age. What its character will be, or what its

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: principal products, it is absolutely impossible for us as yet to

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: conjecture. Meanwhile the Victorian Age recedes, and it loses size and

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: lustre as we get further and further away from it. When what was called

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: "Symbolism" began to act in urgent and direct reaction to the aims of

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: those still in authority, the old order received its notice to quit, but

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: that was at least five and twenty years ago, and the change is not

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: complete. Ages so multiform and redundant and full of blood as the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: Victorian take a long time to die; they have their surprising recoveries

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: and their uncovenanted convalescences. But even they give up the ghost

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: at length, and are buried hastily with scant reverence. The time has

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: doubtless come when aged mourners must prepare themselves to attend the

Poem Title: THE AGONY OF THE VICTORIAN AGE
line: obsequies of the Victorian Age with as much decency as they can muster.
